note.p: Silk throwster and pigeon fancier. Silk throwster in Taunton, 1841, 1851; retired, 1861. Government contractor living in Hackney, Middlesex, 1871.
Census returns of England and Wales 1841 (The National Archives: Public Record Office HO107/972/5/39/23), 1851 (HO107/1922/630/21), 1861 (RG9/1616/81/4), 1871 (RG10/325/38/14)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1966, 1973–95 (Ancestry.co.uk, accessed 17 June 2019)
London, England, Church of England births and baptisms, 1813–1917 (Ancestry.co.uk, accessed 17 June 2019)
